short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful Chrome extension that allows users to collect and report images from Google to Rulta.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rulta Google Image Collector: Streamline Your Reporting 🚀
Enhance your Rulta experience with our efficient Chrome extension, designed to simplify image URL collection from Google.

Key Features:
One-Click Capture 🖱️: Instantly collect image URLs with a single click
Seamless Rulta Integration 🔗: Perfectly syncs with the Rulta platform
User-Friendly Interface 💻: Intuitive design for immediate productivity
Secure & Private 🔒: Operates with minimal permissions, prioritizing your data safety
Regular Updates 🔄: Continuous improvements and prompt support

Ideal for:
Rulta reporters 🕵️‍♀️
Efficiency-focused users ⏱️

Optimize your workflow with the Rulta Google Image Collector - the smart solution for quick and easy image URL gathering. 📸✨
